cast.name: 查文维武·功通拉宁 Chawinvut Kongtoranin
苏拉德·皮凌瓦 Suradej Pinnirat

introduction: 没有人知道他的爱是什么时候开始建立的。但是当他意识到他爱着遥远的地平线时，他无法阻止他对多伦多这座城市的爱。太阳继续发出爱的光芒温暖他的心。以他从未被任何女人打动过的方式去爱。爱不仅仅是“爱”这个词。爱让他做好准备保持他的心，无论是昨天，今天还是明天，他的余生都在天空的尽头，他的爱和微笑永远在等着他。No one knows when his love started to build.  But when he realized that he loved the distant horizon, he could not prevent his love in the coldness that covered the city of Toronto. The sun continued to shine the light of love to warm his heart.  Love in a way that his heart has never touched by any woman before. Love has more than the word "love". Love makes him ready to keep his heart, whether yesterday, today or Tomorrow and the rest of his life at the end of the sky still have his love and smile waiting for him always.
